name: A Fitting Title For A Game About An Astral Child, A creature In A Pot And A Weird Hole Somewhere Near Bali
name_original: A Fitting Title For A Game About An Astral Child, A creature In A Pot And A Weird Hole Somewhere Near Bali
description:
A game made for Secret Santa Jam 2020. The game autosaves upon losing. For controls, just hover over the 'controls' text on the title screen. To proceed to the game from the skill menu, just click the 'DONE' text. Have fun :P

If you find some major bugs or some text cutting off mid sentence, please, let me know ^.^'

UPDATE:

Expanded the skill tree by two skills (one new skillpoint can be found somewhere near the beginning, while the other one is somewhere near the end of the game)

Moved some enemies around and tinkered with a few enemy types

Fixed the screen damage skill and nerfed some endgame traps

ANOTHER UPDATE (probably the last one):

Added some bits of dialogue

Fixed a very broken enemy

Moved some solids around

ANOTHER ANOTHER UPDATE, SINCE THERE WAS A POTENTIAL JOYKILL BUG:

Fixed the issue with not being able to normal-attack after respawning using the essence travel skill (happened if you died while performing a swing)
